protocol

Interface IProtocolServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProtocolServer

    public interface IProtocolServer
    Interface for a server protocol class.

    Tiago DOS SANTOS, François KIM, Philippe PUONG, Axel SAINTILLAN
